location details.area_details: string: The main workplace is located in Agri Square Shinjuku, 5-27-11 Sendagaya, Shibuya-ku, Tokyo.
location details.future_workplace_detail: string: The basic work arrangement involves office work on days other than Wednesday at the office in Shibuya-ku, Tokyo.
location details.transfer_detail: string: There is a possibility of changing the workplace to locations designated by the company.

remote work details.remote_detail: Remote work is available every Wednesday. Employees can choose between office work or working from home on Wednesdays. There's also a Timely Shift system and Monthly Shift system allowing for flexible work arrangements. The remote work policy specifically mentions Wednesday as a work-from-home option, but there's no clear information about remote work on other days.

smoking prevention details.smoking_prevention_detail: Indoor smoking ban policy is adopted. It is presumed that there are no smoking areas within the office due to the indoor smoking ban policy.

age and gender.age_genders: No specific age or gender restrictions mentioned. The position appears to be open to all eligible working-age adults regardless of gender.

employment type period.employment_type_remarks: Full-time employee with no fixed term of employment.
employment type period.employment_period_detail: Employment as a full-time employee with no fixed term.

trial period.trial_period_working_conditions: No changes in conditions during the trial period

contract renewal.contract_renewal_detail: As it is a permanent employment contract, there are no specific renewal conditions.

job posting.job_description: Full-time position in Shibuya, Tokyo. Experience in database design, implementation, and data manipulation using SQL is required. The job involves data quality checks and establishing operational rules for quality maintenance using tools like Great Expectations. It also includes supporting data visualization using BI tools like Looker and Tableau, proposing improvements for data input efficiency, and supporting business improvements using data. The role is part of an internal data analysis team that centrally manages various company data and provides it in a user-friendly format for each business division. The team uses cloud technologies like BigQuery and APIs of various SaaS products for data collection and processing. They utilize the latest technologies necessary for data analysis, such as ETL tools and BI tools. The team works closely with each business division, proposing data utilization and improvements.
job posting.job_charm_details1: Opportunity to work with cutting-edge data analysis technologies and tools
job posting.job_charm_details2: Collaborative work environment with close cooperation between departments
job posting.job_charm_details3: Chance to contribute to business improvements through data analysis and visualization
job posting.future_job_description_detail: After joining, you may be involved in understanding the company's data management system, data preprocessing, and designing and implementing data models.

salary_variable_allowances_attributes.variable_allowance_memo: Family allowance, overtime allowance, late-night allowance, holiday work allowance, commuting allowance, relocation allowance, business trip allowance are included.
salary_variable_allowances_attributes.variable_allowance_content: Family allowance is provided based on the number of children. 30,000 yen/month for 1 child, 50,000 yen/month for 2 children, 60,000 yen/month for 3 or more children, paid until the age of 18. Assistant managers and above are not eligible.

salary information.allowance_detail: Family allowance, overtime allowance, late-night allowance, holiday work allowance, commuting allowance, relocation allowance, business trip allowance are provided.
salary information.salary_detail: Annual income ranges from 5,493,636 yen to 7,687,392 yen. Includes basic salary, overtime pay, and other allowances.
salary information.allowance_commute_detail: Commuting allowance provided up to 100,000 yen per month.
salary information.salary_railse_memo: Salary increase conducted once a year in May.

job working hour.working_hours_detail: Working hours from 9:00 to 18:00. Timely Shift System allows changes up to 1 hour before or after in 30-minute increments.
job working hour.working_hours_condition: Timely Shift System allows changing work hours up to 1 hour before or after in 30-minute increments daily or monthly. Examples: 8:00-17:00, 8:30-17:30, 9:30-18:30, 10:00-19:00. Every Wednesday, employees can choose between office work or remote work. Rakusmile system allows employees to choose suitable working hours and evaluation styles during child-rearing periods, available after 1 year of employment.

recruiment and hiring.prerequisite: Experience in database design and implementation, and experience in data extraction and manipulation using SQL are required. Experience in big data or data analysis infrastructure construction, and experience in business improvement using IT are welcome.
recruiment and hiring.selection_process: The selection process consists of document screening, first interview (with field staff and HR staff), aptitude test, and final interview (with executives), in that order.

holidays and leaves.holidays: Full two-day weekend system (Saturday and Sunday), public holidays, New Year's holidays, summer holidays, paid leave (utilization rate over 93%), maternity leave, special leave (e.g. 7 days for marriage)
holidays and leaves.holidays_remarks: Annual paid leave is granted with a utilization rate of over 93% (as of March 2023). Maternity leave is provided with a 100% return rate after taking leave. Special leave is granted, for example, 7 days of leave for marriage. Every Wednesday, employees can choose between office work or remote work. There's a Timely Shift system allowing changes to working hours up to 1 hour before or after in 30-minute increments daily or monthly. A Monthly Shift system allows changing working hours on a monthly basis. Child nursing leave is available, with 5 days per child, separate from regular paid leave. Backup leave is an additional leave system for emergencies or special circumstances.

welfare insurance.welfare: string: Casual dress code for commuting, family allowance, work-from-home days, timely shift system, qualification acquisition support, nursing leave for children, babysitter subsidy system, backup leave, in-house clubs, in-company social events are provided. Health insurance, employment insurance, welfare pension, and workers' compensation insurance are covered. Social insurance including employment, workers' compensation, health, and welfare pension is fully provided. Transportation expenses are provided up to 100,000 yen per month. Family allowance is provided until the child reaches 18 years old: 30,000 yen/month for 1 child, 50,000 yen/month for 2 children, 60,000 yen/month for 3 or more children (excluding assistant managers and managers). There is a system to support employees' qualification acquisition. A babysitter subsidy system is available as childcare support. In-house clubs such as baseball, futsal, light music, and Gunpla are supported. Events are held to promote interaction among employees. Indoor smoking is prohibited to protect employees' health.
